resources.string: Established in 2015, FlexDrive was born from a simple vision: to redefine mobility. We believe that renting a car should be as flexible and dynamic as your lifestyle. What started as a local passion project has evolved into a leading rental service, trusted by thousands for offering freedom without the hassle.

We do not just hand over keys; we unlock experiences. Whether you need a city car for a day or a luxury SUV for a month, FlexDrive adapts to your needs. With transparent pricing, zero hidden fees, and 24/7 support, we ensure that your only focus is the road ahead.
Rent by day, week or month
What documents do I need to rent a car?
· You need a valid driver\'s license (held for at least one year), a major credit card in the driver\'s name, and proof of identity.
What is the minimum age requirement?
· The minimum age for standard vehicle rental is 21. Drivers under 25 may incur a \'young driver\' surcharge.
What does the basic insurance cover?
· Basic insurance includes Third-Party Liability (TPL) and Collision Damage Waiver (CDW) with an excess deductible. Full Comprehensive insurance is highly recommended.
· Yes, a refundable security deposit will be authorized on your credit card upon vehicle pickup. The amount varies based on the car class and coverage chosen.
· All vehicles are provided with a full tank and must be returned with a full tank. Vehicles returned with less fuel will be charged a refueling fee plus the cost of the missing fuel.
· Cancellations made more than 24 hours before the pickup time receive a full refund. Cancellations made within 24 hours may be subject to a one-day rental fee.
This application was developed by an aspiring developer as a learning project, continuously evolving to incorporate best practices and advanced Android tools.
